answer:
{
    "predicates": [
        "自发性排出：SpontaneousPassing(Patient, Stone) 表示患者可以自发性排出结石。",
        "结石部位：StoneLocation(Stone, Location) 表示结石位于患者体内的部位。",
        "结石大小：StoneSize(Stone, Size) 表示结石的大小。",
        "结石排出概率：PassingProbability(Stone, Probability) 表示结石自行排出的概率。",
        "结石排出时间：PassingTime(Stone, Time) 表示结石排出所需的平均时间。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀p ∀s (SpontaneousPassing(p, s) → (StoneLocation(s, UpperUreter) → PassingProbability(s, 0.49) ∨ StoneLocation(s, MiddleUreter) → PassingProbability(s, 0.58) ∨ StoneLocation(s, LowerUreter) → PassingProbability(s, 0.68))",
        "∀s (StoneSize(s, LessThan5mm) → PassingProbability(s, 0.75) ∨ StoneSize(s, GreaterThan5mm) → PassingProbability(s, 0.62))",
        "∀s (SpontaneousPassing(s) → PassingTime(s, AverageTime) ∧ AverageTime ≈ 17 ∧ 6 ≤ Time ≤ 29)"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [
        "上尿路结石：UpperUrinaryTractStones(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于上尿路。",
        "肾结石：KidneyStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于肾脏。",
        "输尿管结石：UreteralStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于输尿管。",
        "肾集合管结石：PelvisCalycefStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于肾集合管。",
        "肾盏结石：RenalCalyxStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于肾盏。",
        "肾盂结石：RenalPelvisStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于肾盂。",
        "鹿角形结石：StaghornStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石呈鹿角形。",
        "输尿管上段结石：UpperUreteralStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于输尿管上段。",
        "输尿管中段结石：MiddleUreteralStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于输尿管中段。",
        "输尿管下段结石：LowerUreteralStone(Stone) ::: 表示结石位于输尿管下段。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀s (UpperUrinaryTractStones(s) ↔ (KidneyStone(s) ∨ UreteralStone(s)))",
        "∀s (KidneyStone(s) → (PelvisCalycefStone(s) ∨ RenalCalyxStone(s) ∨ RenalPelvisStone(s) ∨ StaghornStone(s)))",
        "∀s (UreteralStone(s) → (UpperUreteralStone(s) ∨ MiddleUreteralStone(s) ∨ LowerUreteralStone(s)))"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [
        "具有临床症状：HasSymptoms(Patient, Symptoms) ::: 表示患者具有泌尿系结石的临床症状。",
        "应进行影像学检查：ShouldUndergoImaging(Patient) ::: 表示患者应该进行影像学检查。",
        "超声波检查：UltrasoundExam(Patient) ::: 表示患者进行超声波检查。",
        "首选方法：PreferredMethod(Patient, ExamType) ::: 表示对于特定人群，某种检查方法是首选。",
        "优点：Advantage(ExamType, Advantage) ::: 表示某种检查方法的优点。",
        "发现结石：DetectStone(ExamType, Size) ::: 表示某种检查方法能够发现特定大小的结石。",
        "敏感性较低：LowSensitivity(ExamType, Location) ::: 表示某种检查方法对于特定位置的诊断敏感性较低。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀p (HasSymptoms(p, UrinaryStoneSymptoms) → ShouldUndergoImaging(p))",
        "∀p (UltrasoundExam(p) → Advantage(Ultrasound, Convenient) ∧ Advantage(Ultrasound, Economical) ∧ Advantage(Ultrasound, NonInvasive))",
        "∀p (UltrasoundExam(p) → DetectStone(Ultrasound, 2mm))",
        "∀p (PreferredMethod(ChildrenAndPregnant, Ultrasound))",
        "∀p (LowSensitivity(Ultrasound, LowerUreteral) ∧ LowSensitivity(Ultrasound, MiddleUreteral))"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [
        "促排石药物：LithotripsyDrugs(DrugType) ::: 表示药物类型属于促排石药物。",
        "α受体阻滞剂：AlphaBlocker(Drug) ::: 表示药物是α受体阻滞剂。",
        "钙通道抑制剂：CalciumChannelBlocker(Drug) ::: 表示药物是钙通道抑制剂。",
        "磷酸二酯酶V型抑制剂：PDEI5(Drug) ::: 表示药物是磷酸二酯酶V型抑制剂。",
        "排石效应：StoneExpulsionEffect(Drug, Evidence) ::: 表示药物具有排石效应，Evidence为临床证据。",
        "增加排石概率：IncreaseStoneExpulsionProbability(Drug, PatientCondition) ::: 表示药物对特定患者条件增加排石概率。",
        "不推荐联合使用：NotRecommendedCombination(Drug1, Drug2) ::: 表示不推荐将两种药物联合使用。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀d (LithotripsyDrugs(d) → (d = AlphaBlocker ∨ d = CalciumChannelBlocker ∨ d = PDEI5))",
        "∀d (d = AlphaBlocker → StoneExpulsionEffect(d, ClinicalEvidence))",
        "∀d1 ∀d2 (d1 = AlphaBlocker ∧ d2 = PDEI5 → NotRecommendedCombination(d1, d2))",
        "∀d1 ∀d2 (d1 = AlphaBlocker ∧ d2 = Corticosteroid → NotRecommendedCombination(d1, d2))",
        "∀p (远端输尿管结石(p) ∧ 直径(p) > 5mm → IncreaseStoneExpulsionProbability(AlphaBlocker, p))"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [
        "非手术治疗适应证：NonSurgicalTreatmentIndication(Patient) 表示患者符合非手术治疗的适应证。",
        "无症状无梗阻结石：AsymptomaticNonObstructiveStones(Patient) 表示患者有无症状、无梗阻的结石。",
        "结石导致患肾无功能：StoneCausedNonFunctionalKidney(Patient) 表示结石导致患者患肾无功能。",
        "对侧肾功能正常：NormalFunctionOppositeKidney(Patient) 表示患者对侧肾功能正常。",
        "体外冲击波碎石禁忌：ESWLContraindication(Patient) 表示患者存在体外冲击波碎石禁忌证。",
        "手术禁忌：SurgicalContraindication(Patient) 表示患者存在各种手术禁忌证。",
        "纠正易发因素：CorrectPredisposingFactors(Patient) 表示患者需要纠正结石的易发因素。",
        "调整饮食结构和饮水习惯：AdjustDietAndHydration(Patient) 表示患者需要调整饮食结构和饮水习惯。",
        "控制BMI：ControlBMI(Patient, BMI) 表示患者需要控制BMI在25kg/m2以下。",
        "维持尿量：MaintainUrineVolume(Patient, Volume) 表示患者需要使24小时尿量维持在2000ml以上。",
        "高尿钙患者：HypercalciuriaPatient(Patient) 表示患者为高尿钙患者。",
        "限盐：LimitSalt(Patient) 表示患者需要限盐。",
        "保证钙摄入：EnsureCalciumIntake(Patient, Intake) 表示患者需要保证每日钙摄入量1000mg以上。",
        "少食草酸食物：LimitOxalateFood(Patient) 表示患者需要少食富含草酸的食物。",
        "适当运动：ModerateExercise(Patient) 表示患者需要适当运动。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀p (NonSurgicalTreatmentIndication(p) ↔ (AsymptomaticNonObstructiveStones(p) ∨ StoneCausedNonFunctionalKidney(p) ∧ NormalFunctionOppositeKidney(p) ∨ ESWLContraindication(p) ∧ SurgicalContraindication(p)))",
        "∀p (NonSurgicalTreatmentIndication(p) → (CorrectPredisposingFactors(p) ∧ AdjustDietAndHydration(p) ∧ ControlBMI(p, 25) ∧ MaintainUrineVolume(p, 2000) ∧ (HypercalciuriaPatient(p) → LimitSalt(p) ∧ EnsureCalciumIntake(p, 1000) ∧ LimitOxalateFood(p)) ∧ ModerateExercise(p)))"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [
        "输尿管结石：UreteralStone(Patient) 表示患者有输尿管结石。",
        "直径小于5mm：DiameterLessThan5mm(Stone) 表示结石的直径小于5mm。",
        "直径5~10mm：DiameterBetween5And10mm(Stone) 表示结石的直径在5mm到10mm之间。",
        "非手术治疗：NonSurgicalTreatment(Patient) 表示患者首选非手术治疗。",
        "自行排出：SpontaneousPassing(Stone) 表示结石可以自行排出。",
        "大量饮水：DrinkPlenty(Patient) 表示患者每天饮水2500~3000ml。",
        "适度运动：ModerateExercise(Patient) 表示患者进行适度运动。",
        "应用镇痛药物：UsePainReliefMedication(Patient) 表示患者使用镇痛药物。",
        "定期监测：RegularMonitoring(Patient) 表示患者定期监测结石位置及肾积水变化。",
        "排石时间：StonePassingTime(Patient, Days) 表示患者排石所需时间。",
        "随访观察：FollowUpObservation(Patient, Days) 表示患者随访观察的时间。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀p ∀s (UreteralStone(p) ∧ DiameterLessThan5mm(s) → (SpontaneousPassing(s) ∧ NonSurgicalTreatment(p)))",
        "∀p ∀s (UreteralStone(p) ∧ DiameterBetween5And10mm(s) → NonSurgicalTreatment(p))",
        "∀p (NonSurgicalTreatment(p) → (DrinkPlenty(p) ∧ ModerateExercise(p) ∧ UsePainReliefMedication(p) ∧ RegularMonitoring(p)))",
        "∀p (UreteralStone(p) → (StonePassingTime(p, Days) ∧ Days ≥ 6 ∧ Days ≤ 29))",
        "∀p (UreteralStone(p) → (FollowUpObservation(p, Days) ∧ Days ≤ 30))"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [
        "TRUS表现：TRUS(Patient) ::: 表示患者进行了经直肠前列腺超声检查。",
        "MRI表现：MRI(Patient) ::: 表示患者进行了磁共振成像检查。",
        "核素骨显像表现：BoneScan(Patient) ::: 表示患者进行了核素骨显像检查。",
        "CT表现：CT(Patient) ::: 表示患者进行了计算机断层扫描术检查。",
        "前列腺癌可能性：ProstateCancerLikelihood(Score, Likelihood) ::: 表示根据PI-RADS评分，前列腺癌的可能性。",
        "穿刺阳性率：NeedleBiopsyRate(Score, Rate) ::: 表示根据PI-RADS评分，穿刺的阳性率。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀p (TRUS(p) → (低回声结节(p) ∧ 肿瘤体积大小(p)))",
        "∀p (MRI(p) → (前列腺包膜完整性(p) ∧ 肿瘤侵犯情况(p) ∧ 淋巴结受侵犯情况(p) ∧ 骨转移病灶(p)))",
        "∀p (BoneScan(p) → (骨转移灶发现时间(p) ∧ 敏感性和特异性(p)))",
        "∀p (CT(p) → (肿瘤临床分期(p) ∧ 肿瘤侵犯情况(p) ∧ 肿大淋巴结情况(p)))",
        "∀s (ProstateCancerLikelihood(s, 非常低) → NeedleBiopsyRate(s, 0%))",
        "∀s (ProstateCancerLikelihood(s, 低) → NeedleBiopsyRate(s, 20%))",
        "∀s (ProstateCancerLikelihood(s, 中等) → NeedleBiopsyRate(s, 20%))",
        "∀s (ProstateCancerLikelihood(s, 高) → NeedleBiopsyRate(s, 50%))",
        "∀s (ProstateCancerLikelihood(s, 非常高) → NeedleBiopsyRate(s, 80%))"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [

{
    "predicates": [
        "Gleason分级：GleasonGrade(Tumor) ::: 表示肿瘤的Gleason分级。",
        "ISUP分级评分：ISUPScore(Tumor, Score) ::: 表示肿瘤的ISUP分级评分。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀t (GleasonGrade(t) = 1 ↔ (单个的分化良好的腺体密集排列(t) ∧ 形成界线清楚的结节(t)))",
        "∀t (GleasonGrade(t) = 2 ↔ (单个的分化良好的腺体较疏松排列(t) ∧ 形成界线较清楚的结节(t) ∧ 可伴微小浸润(t)))",
        "∀t (GleasonGrade(t) = 3 ↔ 分散独立的分化良好的腺体(t))",
        "∀t (GleasonGrade(t) = 4 ↔ (分化不良腺体(t) ∨ 融合腺体(t) ∨ 筛状腺体(t) ∨ 包括肾小球样结构腺体(t)))",
        "∀t (GleasonGrade(t) = 5 ↔ (缺乏腺性分化(t) ∧ (片状腺体(t) ∨ 条索状腺体(t) ∨ 线状腺体(t) ∨ 实性腺体(t) ∨ 单个细胞腺体(t)) ∧ (或坏死(t) ∧ (乳头坏死(t) ∨ 筛状坏死(t) ∨ 实性伴坏死(t))))",
        "∀t (ISUPScore(t, 6) ↔ (GleasonGrade(t) = 1 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 3) ∨ (GleasonGrade(t) = 3 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 3))",
        "∀t (ISUPScore(t, 7) ↔ (GleasonGrade(t) = 3 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 4) ∨ (GleasonGrade(t) = 4 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 3))",
        "∀t (ISUPScore(t, 8) ↔ (GleasonGrade(t) = 4 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 4) ∨ (GleasonGrade(t) = 3 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 5) ∨ (GleasonGrade(t) = 5 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 3))",
        "∀t (ISUPScore(t, 9) ↔ (GleasonGrade(t) = 5 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 4) ∨ (GleasonGrade(t) = 4 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 5))",
        "∀t (ISUPScore(t, 10) ↔ (GleasonGrade(t) = 5 ∧ GleasonGrade(t) = 5))"
    ]
}

{
    "predicates": [
        "原发肿瘤不能评价：PrimaryTumorInevaluable(Patient) 表示患者的原发肿瘤不能评价。",
        "无原发肿瘤证据：NoPrimaryTumorEvidence(Patient) 表示患者无原发肿瘤证据。",
        "临床隐匿肿瘤：ClinicallyOccludedTumor(Patient) 表示患者有不可扪及和影像学难以发现的临床隐匿肿瘤。",
        "偶发肿瘤：IncidentalTumor(Patient, Volume) 表示患者有偶发肿瘤，Volume 表示肿瘤体积占所切除组织体积的百分比。",
        "肿瘤可触及：TumorPalpable(Patient) 表示患者的肿瘤可触及。",
        "肿瘤局限于前列腺内：TumorLimitedToProstate(Patient) 表示患者的肿瘤仅局限于前列腺内。",
        "肿瘤侵犯两叶：TumorInvolvesTwoLobes(Patient) 表示患者的肿瘤侵犯两叶。",
        "肿瘤突破前列腺包膜：TumorBreaksProstateCapsule(Patient) 表示患者的肿瘤突破前列腺包膜。",
        "肿瘤侵犯包膜外：TumorInvadesBeyondCapsule(Patient, Laterality) 表示患者的肿瘤侵犯包膜外，Laterality 表示侵犯是单侧还是双侧。",
        "肿瘤侵犯精囊：TumorInvadesSeminalVesicles(Patient) 表示患者的肿瘤侵犯精囊。",
        "肿瘤固定或侵犯邻近组织：TumorFixedOrInvadesAdjacentStructures(Patient) 表示患者的肿瘤固定或侵犯除精囊外的其他邻近组织结构。",
        "区域淋巴结不能评价：RegionalLymphNodesInevaluable(Patient) 表示患者的区域淋巴结不能评价。",
        "无区域淋巴结转移：NoRegionalLymphNodeMetastasis(Patient) 表示患者无区域淋巴结转移。",
        "区域淋巴结转移：RegionalLymphNodeMetastasis(Patient) 表示患者有区域淋巴结转移。",
        "无远处转移：NoDistantMetastasis(Patient) 表示患者无远处转移。",
        "远处转移：DistantMetastasis(Patient, Type) 表示患者有远处转移，Type 表示转移类型，如淋巴结转移、骨转移或其他脏器转移。"
    ],
    "logicexpression": [
        "∀p (PrimaryTumorInevaluable(p) ↔ ¬(NoPrimaryTumorEvidence(p) ∨ ClinicallyOccludedTumor(p) ∨ IncidentalTumor(p, 0.05) ∨ IncidentalTumor(p, >0.05) ∨ TumorInvolvesTwoLobes(p)))",
        "∀p (TumorPalpable(p) → TumorLimitedToProstate(p))",
        "∀p (TumorBreaksProstateCapsule(p) → (TumorInvadesBeyondCapsule(p, Unilateral) ∨ TumorInvadesBeyondCapsule(p, Bilateral) ∨ TumorInvadesSeminalVesicles(p) ∨ TumorFixedOrInvadesAdjacentStructures(p)))",
        "∀p (RegionalLymphNodesInevaluable(p) ↔ ¬(NoRegionalLymphNodeMetastasis(p) ∨ RegionalLymphNodeMetastasis(p)))",
        "∀p (NoDistantMetastasis(p) ↔ ¬DistantMetastasis(p, AnyType))"
    ]
}

{
